keyPolicies.policyDescription: Philip Hollobone calls attention to the scale of the immigration, suggesting that it has been framed negatively affecting the UK and overwhelming indigenous culture.

The leaflet mentions opposition to housing developments in Kettering and north Northamptonshire comparable to the size of Bristol. It emphasizes preserving infrastructure, jobs, and houses for the existing population.
The importance of policing is emphasized, with Hollobone reflecting his contribution to the debate and his view on anti-social behavior and general law-and-order issues.
There is criticism over the existing road network maintenance, particularly during winter, highlighted by the expenses potentially needed to fix these issues.
Philip Hollobone expresses an opinion that regulations restricting the wearing of the burka should be considered in public as oppressive dress codes that are regressive.

issues.immigration: Philip Hollobone calls attention to the scale of the immigration, suggesting that it has been framed negatively affecting the UK and overwhelming indigenous culture.

housing.content: The leaflet mentions opposition to housing developments in Kettering and north Northamptonshire comparable to the size of Bristol. It emphasizes preserving infrastructure, jobs, and houses for the existing population.
